resources.string: Take note, once you close the application, your test will be null.
This exam may include multiple selection questions with only an answer, as well as short answer written questions.

Multiple selection questions with only an answer are formed by a sentence, the formulation of the evaluation and four answer choices, coded as A, B, C and D, in which of them, just one is correct and valid solution for given question.\n You can scroll over questions and answers. On the time you want to pick an answer, you just need to double touch it.

Short answer written questions don\'t have answer choices. Student builds (produces, elaborates, writes) an answer according to the evaluation task assigned, in a defined space.\n You can scroll over questions and answers. On the time you want to answer, you just need to fill the text field.
